document.title: The CISRA Document Database
document.author: A.Newman
document.abstract: This document describes the CISRA document database, its structure, and the implementation in ICI. It assumes the reader is familiar with the following acronyms: HTML, HTTP, TCP/IP, CGI, XML, LDAP, ICI, OOP, DLL, W3C, and so on.

revision.comment: This is the initial version of the document.
